entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chilliwack
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Agassiz 11:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: WNW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Wet snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this evening. Wet snow mixed with rain beginning late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm over higher terrain. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Wet snow mixed with rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
